channel.title: [Delta][Czar[317]Adding a 100% Fishing to your server using Arrays![317][Delta]
channel.description:
Hello Moparscapians :D this was a request from DivineSouls anyways, i dont have much time to explain, because i have to go. but mods, please give me a couple hours to edit my post and explain!!
[b]Difficulty:[/b] 0 [b]Tested on:[/b] Toxicity, Sifscape, Richscape, Summon-pkz, Czar, Delta [b]Classes created:[/b] FishingHandler.java [b]Classes Edited:[/b] None
OK, so, this uses Arrays, proper Java coding conventions, and very little Case methods, and ItemOnObject heres the class: NOTE: you dont have to Do ANY WORK!!!!!!!!! just add this class to your server, and compile!
[size=24pt]Make Sure you change the Item ID's of the Fishing equipment!!!!!!![/size]
heres the class: http://pastebin.com/j9rjyBrh
MODS: theres nothing to explain, but please tell me if i need to do any explaining if needed before locking the topic!!!!!! Thanks, and Have fun with your new fishing Skill!!!!!!!
Creds:

anyways, i dont have much time to explain, because i have to go. but mods, please give me a couple hours to edit my post and explain!!
